description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Donate-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=paypal&color=007CB1[/img][/url]
Weakaura Pack for the Mythic + Affix Prideful
Designed to be used together with https://wago.io/PridefulAffixTracker


If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1.
If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/sharedmedia_causese

Special thanks for the coding help to the Weakauras discord!

Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].
If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html: Weakaura Pack for the Mythic + Affix Prideful Designed to be used together with https://wago.io/PridefulAffixTracker If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1. If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/sharedmedia_causese Special thanks for the coding help to the Weakauras discord! Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

comments.text: [taggeduser]@rolokking#1679[/taggeduser] what? the weakaura is movable like every weakaura in the existence of the addon

is there a way to move the it so that is not in the middle. only asking coz it make it hard to pick up item when need to. if you do make it movable might want to also add a way to lock it in place once you place it where you want it.

changelog.text: last fix will incorporate this into my dungeon weakaura so use that :D
- some initial fixes after my first key with the affix gotta figure out the spellid of the debuff

removed Affix tracker since Translit Updated his Aura for the Prideful Affix get it here: 
https://wago.io/PridefulAffixTracker

the prideful tracker wanted a new glow and sound so he got what he asked for
